title: Who can support me follow and like my TikTok? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dear, Many people can support you in this way. But this thing is for the short-term. Either they unfollow your account. And these people will not like you from the heart. This is not the right way to grow on TikTok. I’ll suggest you focus on your content ( either videos or anything else ) and keep uploading videos daily and consistently. This will result in making your loyal followers. Thankyou
